00023   double GW;

00027                 double,double,double);

00037 class ECIntegral {
00038  public:
00044   ECIntegral(PPair *pPair) {
00045     coulfunc_ = new CoulFunc(pPair);
00046     whitfunc_ = new WhitFunc(pPair);
00047     chanrad_ = pPair->GetChRad();
00048     total_sep_e_=pPair->GetSepE()+pPair->GetExE();
00049   };
00053   ~ECIntegral() {
00054     delete coulfunc_;
00055     delete whitfunc_;
00056   };
00062   ECIntResult operator()(int li, int lf, int multL, double inEnergy, double levelEnergy) const {
00063     return gsl_ec_integral(coulfunction(),whitfunction(),li,lf,multL,
00064                            inEnergy-TotalSepE(),fabs(levelEnergy-TotalSepE()),ChanRad());
00065   };
00069   CoulFunc *coulfunction() const {return coulfunc_;};
00073   WhitFunc *whitfunction() const {return whitfunc_;};
00077   double ChanRad() const {return chanrad_;};
00081   double TotalSepE() const {return total_sep_e_;};
00082  private:
00083   CoulFunc *coulfunc_;
00084   WhitFunc *whitfunc_;
00085   double chanrad_;
00086   double total_sep_e_ ;
00087 };
